title: Alternations
description:
The word 'or' is performed with a pipe symbol '|' and allows matching of character sets on either side.
      For instance to match with both 'I love cats' or 'I love dogs', one would simply write 'I love cats|dogs.'
question:
Suppose your email is 'email@email.com' and your phone number is '123-456-7890', how would you write code to match
      the following phrases: 'you can reach me at email@email.com' or 'you can reach me at 123-456-7890'
answer: you can reach me at email@email.com|123-456-7890
